Nahetu
Saññojanagocchaka
Saññojanasampayuttaduka
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Nahetu
47.
1439Saññojanasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanasampayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—  vicikicchāsahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato moho. (1)
1440Saññojanasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—  uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca uddhaccasahagato moho. (2)
1441Saññojanavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—  ahetukaṃ saññojanavippayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ…pe… . (Yāva asaññasattā, saṃkhittaṃ.) (1)
